Title: Celebrate National Day with the sound of the Leap Forward
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Text on the lantern: 普天同庆 (The whole nation joins in the jubilation).This is a print from the second edition (also September 1958).
Theme: 1 October, National Day of the People's Republic of ChinaGreat Leap Forward (1958-1961)
